input.description:
An error code. If code exists, then, an XML is returned. For example: 100 Unknown error
Uknown error
Please contact BAO administrator If code does not exist, it will return an error text indicating error with the given code does not exist. For example: Error definition with code: '10' not found!

Tokens are used to replace values present in the details part of the error message. Token structure is as below:
<tokens> <token idx="1">replacement-value-1</token> <token idx="2">replacement-value-2</token> </tokens>

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="tokens">${tokens}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//*[code/text() = '${error code}'])"> <xsl:copy-of select="//*[code/text() = '${error code}']" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <result> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Error definition with code: '${error code}' not found!</xsl:text> </result> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="tokens">${tokens}</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="idx" select="0" /> <xsl:variable name="rootNodeName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:element name="{$rootNodeName}"> <xsl:apply-templates select="/*/*" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="/*/*"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="name(.) = 'details'"> <xsl:variable name="idx" select="$idx+ 1" /> <xsl:variable name="origText" select="." /> <details> <xsl:for-each select="xalan:nodeset($tokens)//*"> <xsl:call-template name="ReplaceToken"> <xsl:with-param name="idx" select="$idx" /> <xsl:with-param name="inStr" select="$origText" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:for-each> </details> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="ReplaceToken"> <xsl:param name="idx" /> <xsl:param name="inStr" /> <xsl:variable name="origText" select="concat(concat(substring-before($inStr, "{"), .), substring-after($inStr, "}"))" /> <xsl:value-of select="$origText" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
